name: Computer Vision API
description: Allows you to analyze images and videos, extract information, and perform tasks such as object detection, image tagging, and image recognition.

name: Custom Vision API
description: Allows you to train custom image classification models for your specific needs.

name: Content Moderator API
description: Allows you to automatically moderate text, image, and video content for offensive, sexual, or other unwanted content.

name: Face API
description: Allows you to detect and recognize faces, as well as perform tasks such as facial recognition and facial emotion detection.

name: Speech API
description: Allows you to convert speech to text, text to speech, and perform tasks such as speech recognition, transcription, and speech synthesis.

name: Text Analytics API
description: Allows you to extract insights from unstructured text, such as sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, and language detection.

name: Translator Text API
description: Allows you to translate text from one language to another.

name: Language Understanding API
description: Allows you to understand the intent and entities in text, and to perform tasks such as natural language understanding and natural language generation.

name: Anomaly Detector API
description: Allows you to detect anomalies in time-series data, such as sensor data or log files.

name: Form Recognizer API
description: Allows you to extract information from forms such as receipts, invoices, and ID cards.

name: Personalizer API
description: Allows you to personalize the user experience by learning from the user's interactions and making real-time decisions.

name: QnA Maker API
description: Allows you to create a knowledge base of question-answer pairs and use it to automatically answer questions from users.

name: Search API
description: Allows you to add search functionality to your application, such as web search, document search, and suggestions.
